tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE LoadSheddingStrategy (
    area_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP,
    status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE PowerConsumption (
    consumption_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    zone_id INT,
    consumption_amount DECIMAL,
    measurement_time TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (zone_id) REFERENCES LoadSheddingZone(zone_id)
);

CREATE TABLE StrategyZoneMapping (
    mapping_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_id INT,
    zone_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (strategy_id) REFERENCES LoadSheddingStrategy(strategy_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (zone_id) REFERENCES LoadSheddingZone(zone_id)
);

CREATE TABLE load_shedding_strategies (
  strategy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  strategy_name VARCHAR(50),
  start_time TIMESTAMP,
  end_time TIMESTAMP,
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE real_time_data (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  load_amount INT,
  voltage FLOAT,
  frequency FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE blackout_history (
  blackout_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  duration INT,
  affected_area VARCHAR(100),
  cause TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE alert_messages (
  message_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  message_text TEXT,
  sender VARCHAR(50),
  receiver VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  notification_type VARCHAR(50),
  preferred_time TIME,
  email VARCHAR(100),
  phone_number VARCHAR(20)
)
